docs.text: Welcome to HelloCodex This site contains documentation for the sample Python scripts in this repository. hello.py demonstrates a simple greeting function. text_rpg.py is a minimal text-based RPG battle. Check the README for usage instructions.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: This site contains documentation for the sample Python scripts in this repository. hello.py demonstrates a simple greeting function. text_rpg.py is a minimal text-based RPG battle. Check the README for usage instructions.
docs.title: Welcome to HelloCodex

docs.text: About HelloCodex is a minimal project used to test Codex's ability to update code repositories. The codebase includes: hello.py - prints a greeting for a name you provide. text_rpg.py - a tiny text RPG battle demonstrating basic Python classes.
docs.title: About
